about_the_game:
About


You're so much prettier when you smile. And here is something that I know will make you smile: the opening chapter of an idiot's odyssey! Play as Maximillian Wurst, a grandiloquent poetaster who is in pursuit of the resistant, fiesty Fialova (and by "fiesty" I mean "understandably outraged"). Fialova cannot stand Max for the simple reason that he is, as the Spanish would say, a douchebag. Does that deter Max? Only you can decide! It's all up to you! But actually, no.



The Delusions of Maximillian Wurst constitutes about 20-30 minutes of gameplay. The game so far is free, and I would love to hear your feedback!

Features

  • Loop-de-loop platformer levels.
  • Artwork derived from classic paintings and sculpture.
  • An original score by the inimitable composer Elizabeth Legierski.
  • A rather uncomfortable anecdote told by father whilst you are intoxicated.
  • Purple prose up the old wazoo.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains some nudity derived from classical paintings, as well as some dialogue that alludes to sexual intercourse.

name: The Delusions of Maximillian Wurst

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews:
“It’s a lot of fun and the levels are packed with crazy stuff to discover. The voice acting and dialogue are particularly hilarious and even though Max is possibly the most annoying person on the planet, he’s a lot of fun to spend some time with. Highly recommended.”
Alpha Beta Gamer
short_description: The first chapter of a loop-de-loop platformer in which you control Maximillian Wurst, silver-tongued poet and abject moron, as he pursues a fantasy that wants nothing to do with him. Escape Father Time! Shoot as many Chadwicks as you can! Stumble along with poison coursing through your lily liver!
